verses.verse: My heart<WH3820> overflows<WH7370> with a noble<WH2896> theme.<WH1697> I recite<WH559> my verses<WH4639> for the king.<WH4428> My tongue<WH3956> is like the pen<WH5842> of a skillful<WH4106> writer.<WH5608>
You are the most excellent<WH3302> of the sons<WH1121> of men.<WH120> Grace<WH2580> has anointed<WH3332> your lips,<WH8193> therefore God<WH430> has blessed<WH1288> you forever.<WH5769>
Strap<WH2296> your sword<WH2719> on your thigh,<WH3409> mighty<WH1368> one:<WH1935> your splendor and your majesty.<WH1926>

In your majesty<WH1926> ride<WH7392> on victoriously<WH6743> on behalf<WH1697> of truth,<WH571> humility,<WH6037> and righteousness.<WH6664> Let your right hand<WH3225> display<WH3384> awesome deeds.<WH3372>
Your arrows<WH2671> are sharp.<WH8150> The nations<WH5971> fall<WH5307> under you,<WH3820> with arrows in the heart of the king<WH4428>'s enemies.<WH341>
Your throne,<WH3678> God,<WH430> is forever<WH5703> and ever.<WH5769> A scepter<WH7626> of equity<WH4334> is the scepter<WH7626> of your kingdom.<WH4438>

You have loved<WH157> righteousness,<WH6664> and hated<WH8130> wickedness.<WH7562> Therefore God,<WH430> your God,<WH430> has anointed<WH4886> you with the oil<WH8081> of gladness<WH8342> above your fellows.<WH2270>
All your garments<WH899> smell like myrrh,<WH4753> aloes,<WH174> and cassia.<WH7102> Out of ivory<WH8127> palaces<WH1964> stringed<WH4482> instruments have made you glad.<WH8055>
Kings<WH4428>' daughters<WH1323> are among your honorable women.<WH3368> At your right hand<WH3225> the queen<WH7694> stands<WH5324> in gold<WH3800> of Ophir.<WH211>
Listen,<WH8085> daughter,<WH1323> consider,<WH7200> and turn<WH5186> your ear.<WH241> Forget<WH7911> your own people,<WH5971> and also your father<WH1>'s house.<WH1004>
So the king<WH4428> will desire<WH183> your beauty,<WH3308> honor<WH7812> him,<WH113> for he is your lord.
The daughter<WH1323> of Tyre<WH6865> comes with a gift.<WH4503> The rich<WH6223> among the people<WH5971> entreat<WH2470> your favor.<WH6440>
The<WH4428> princess<WH1323> inside<WH6441> is all glorious.<WH3520> Her clothing<WH3830> is interwoven<WH4865> with gold.<WH2091>
She shall be led<WH2986> to the king<WH4428> in embroidered work.<WH7553> The virgins,<WH1330> her companions<WH7464> who follow<WH310> her,<WH935> shall be brought to you.
With gladness<WH8057> and rejoicing<WH1524> they shall be led.<WH2986> They shall enter<WH935> into the king<WH4428>'s palace.<WH1964>
Your sons<WH1121> will take the place of your fathers.<WH1> You shall make<WH7896> them princes<WH8269> in all the earth.<WH776>
I will make your name<WH8034> to be remembered<WH2142> in all<WH1755> generations.<WH1755> Therefore the peoples<WH5971> shall give you thanks<WH3034> forever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5769>
